headline: Exclusive: George Soros-backed political action committee Color Of Change pulled $500,000 in funding from super-liberal DA Alvin Bragg's campaign after disturbing allegation was made against him by unnamed woman
author: Shawn Cohen
sentences: 'Color of Change Political Action Committee ceased our independent expenditure on this electoral campaign after receiving this information,' a Color of Change source with firsthand knowledge of the situation told DailyMail.com.Color Of Change PAC, the political action committee of the nation's largest online racial justice group, received $1 million in May from billionaire philanthropist George Soros to support Bragg's progressive candidacy for district attorney,

A disturbing allegation against Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg during the primary led a George Soros-backed political action committee, Color Of Change, to pull a half million dollars in funding from his campaign last spring, DailyMail.com can now reveal.
